title: Every Time of its Exposition Since 1978
post: Hello, Dan:  I too hope to visit Torino during the exposition. It will be the first time for me and I’m really looking forward to it.. I have written a trilogy about the Shroud of Turin (not published yet, but hoping) and because of all the research I’ve done, am so anxious to see the burial cloth of our Savior. I believe it’s the first fictional trilogy where the people actually living at the various times intermingle with my characters.
author: Rosalie Giansante
